text: Nia DaCosta (born November 8, 1989) is an American director and screenwriter. She was born in New York City. She wrote and directed the crime thriller movie Little Woods (2019). She also directed the horror movie Candyman (2021). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:African- American movie directors Category:African-American screenwriters
title: Nia DaCosta
